title: Understanding Self-Signed Projects
text: A self-signed project involves using a digital certificate that is not issued by a trusted certificate authority. Instead, it is created and signed by the entity itself.

title: Purpose of Self-Signed Certificates
text: Self-signed certificates are often used for testing purposes or in environments where trust is established through other means.

hintAnswer: signed macros using a $$self-issued$$ digital certificate
title: Identifying Self-Signed Projects
choices: signed macros using a $$self-issued$$ digital certificate
>signed macros using a certificate from a trusted authority
